Extracted Data.Name: DHEERAJ MADHAV RAO
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: An analytical and business focused finance professional with experience across FP&A, inventory planning, and technology finance. Adaptive to translating complex data into actionable insights to drive strategic decisions. Proven track record in optimizing budgets, automating reporting workflows, and partnering with leadership on high impact initiatives. Proficient in Excel, SQL, Power BI, Python, and financial modeling. Actively seeking roles in Financial Analysis, Data Analytics, or Business Consulting.

Experience.Title: Senior Analyst – Inventory Replenishment Planning
Experience.Description: Led forecasting for high impact inventory categories aligned to corporate goals. Built Power BI dashboards to automate metrics reporting, saving 60% effort. Partnered cross functionally to evaluate excess inventory pricing and markdowns. Automated recurring reports using SQL, Excel, and Power Automate workflows. Delivered business insights to senior leadership on stock health and velocity.

Experience.Title: Analyst – Technology Finance
Experience.Description: Managed $500M software budget portfolio; identified $2.5M in savings. Built a Python based tracker to monitor forecasts and accruals, saving 10+ hrs/month. Automated workflows and reports using ChatGPT, Python, and Power Automate. Provided cost, variance, and forecast insights to cross functional stakeholders.

Experience.Title: Associate Intern
Experience.Description: Developed and tested Python based F&O strategies for institutional clients. Delivered trading and risk management insights to improve portfolio outcomes. Created models to manage leverage and reduce drawdown impact.

Experience.Title: Civil & Project Engineer
Experience.Description: Oversaw 1000 crore CIDCO housing project across 15 contractors. Ensured structural and material quality; resolved site level issues in real time. Delivered foundation slabs in record 6 month cycles to maintain timelines.

Projects: Stock Indicator App: Developed a Python tool to backtest strategies using technical indicators for retail traders.
X Culture Challenge: Designed a go to market strategy with international teammates for a real business client.
SCOT Store Project: Led vendor outreach and collected feedback for sustainable store relaunch planning.
Extracted Data.Education:
PGDM, T A Pai Management Institute, Manipal 2021 – 2023, CGPA: 7.08
B.E. – Civil Engineering, Pillai HOC College of Engg. 2013 – 2017, CGPA: 7.38
Class XII, DAV Public School 2013, Percentage: 83.2%
Class X, DAV Public School 2011, CGPA: 9.4

Recommendations: **Quantify achievements** in the experience section with specific numbers and metrics to demonstrate the impact of your work. For example, instead of saying 'Improved efficiency,' specify 'Improved efficiency by 15% resulting in a cost saving of $50,000'.

Explicitly list **soft skills** relevant to the target roles, such as communication, leadership, problem-solving, and teamwork, to showcase a well-rounded professional profile. Providing clear examples of when these skills were deployed could be powerful.

Add any relevant **certifications** (e.g., CFA, FRM, data analysis certifications) to increase credibility and demonstrate expertise in specialized areas; this will significantly increase your score in certifications

Tailor your resume **objective** more specifically to each job application, highlighting the skills and experiences that align most closely with the requirements of the role. Customize the skills section for each application.
In your **Civil & Project Engineer** role, include the company name. This will provide recruiters with important context.
Re-evaluate the **resume format** to ensure it is ATS-friendly. Using standard fonts and clear section headings can help with parsing.

The resume is two pages, which is acceptable but consider **condensing information** for a one-page resume if possible, focusing on the most relevant achievements. Make sure every piece of information aligns with the job description.

RESUME_TIPS: Elaborate on your inventory planning experience at Lowe's India by detailing how you used **ABC classification** to prioritize inventory and improve **inventory turnover ratio**. Quantify the impact, such as a **percentage increase in inventory turnover** or a **reduction in stockouts**.

In your experience at Lowe's, specify your familiarity with **EOQ (Economic Order Quantity)** models and other inventory optimization techniques. Mention any **min/max** inventory level strategies implemented to improve efficiency, and include these details under the Skills section.

Showcase your experience with **ERP systems** such as **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** if applicable, or similar systems. Explain how you utilized these systems to manage inventory, track sales data, and generate reports, adding it under your relevant experience section.

Mention your experience with **omnichannel inventory** management, specifically detailing how you integrated retail and online inventory data. Include details about how you handled **store fill rate** challenges and managed **stock out** situations, potentially under your Lowe's experience.

Quantify the improvements in **forecast accuracy** achieved through your demand forecasting efforts. Use metrics such as **reduction in forecast error percentage** to demonstrate your analytical skills and add more detail to the Senior Analyst role.

Add specific examples of how you improved **store performance** through your inventory analytics and reporting. Mention any **dashboards** you created to track **store fill rate**, and include this information within your Senior Analyst experience.

In your projects, explain how you applied statistical methods for **demand forecasting**. Include details about the forecasting techniques used and their impact on inventory accuracy, placing this under the Projects section.

Expand on your Power BI skills by detailing any advanced techniques you used, such as **DAX calculations** or **complex data modeling**. Showcase how these skills helped improve **reporting adherence and usage**, ideally under the Skills section.

In your experience section, quantify the impact of your inventory replenishment strategies. For example, mention any improvements in **stock out %** or **overstock %** as a result of your planning efforts.

In your Senior Analyst role, provide specific examples of how you collaborated with merchandising and sales teams to align **demand forecasting** with marketing inputs and promotions. Quantify the business benefits of this collaboration, adding these to your work experience bullet points.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn about different inventory management strategies, including ABC analysis to prioritize items based on their value and impact.
Master techniques for demand forecasting and inventory optimization, covering ABC classification for better inventory control.
A basic course covering the fundamental principles of inventory management, including how ABC classification is applied.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn about the Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) model and its application in optimizing supply chain costs and inventory levels.

EOQ.COURSE_NAME: Inventory Management Mastery: EOQ and Beyond
EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Dive deep into EOQ and other advanced inventory management techniques to minimize costs and improve efficiency.
Covers the basics of inventory control and introduces the EOQ formula and its applications.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Explore the fundamental concepts of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems and their role in business management.
Learn the end-to-end process of implementing ERP systems, covering planning, configuration, and deployment.
Provides a concise overview of what ERP systems are and their functions in business operations.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the basics of NetSuite, including navigation, modules, and how to use it for business management tasks.
Covers the implementation and configuration of NetSuite ERP, including modules relevant to inventory and supply chain.
A collection of tutorials on various NetSuite features and functionalities.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: A practical guide to using Zoho Inventory for managing stock, orders, and warehouses effectively.

Zoho.COURSE_NAME: Zoho CRM - The Complete Zoho CRM Course
Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Zoho CRM and other Zoho apps to manage sales, marketing, and customer service processes.
Tutorials on using Zoho Inventory for stock management, order tracking, and reporting.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn about various e-commerce operations management tools and techniques, including platforms like Unicommerce.

Unicommerce.COURSE_NAME: E-commerce Logistics and Supply Chain Management
Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive course on managing e-commerce logistics and supply chain, featuring inventory platforms.
An introduction to managing e-commerce platforms, including aspects of inventory management.

Tableau.DESCRIPTION: Prepare for the Tableau Desktop Specialist certification and learn to create interactive dashboards and visualizations.

Tableau.COURSE_NAME: Tableau A-Z: Hands-On Tableau Training For Data Science!
Tableau.DESCRIPTION: A comprehensive course covering all aspects of Tableau, from basic visualizations to advanced analytics.
A free tutorial series for beginners to learn the basics of Tableau.
